abstract: New York City Council will introduce five bills aimed at unregulated flophouses, known as 'three-quarter' houses, which have spread across city in recent years.

headline.print_headline: City Council Will Introduce 5 Bills to Regulate Flophouses
headline.main: New York City Council to Review 5 Bills Reining In ‘Three-Quarter’ Homes

snippet: The legislation seeks to help addicts and others living in the flophouses get stable housing and prevent fraud and other problems in an unregulated industry.
lead_paragraph: The legislation seeks to help addicts and others living in the flophouses get stable housing and prevent fraud and other problems in an unregulated industry.
